hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Momentum Divergence at Stress Exit
hypothesis_content.statement: When market exits STRESS regime (VIX term structure normalizes, funding rates recover), select altcoins (SOL, AVAX) showing positive 5-day price momentum while BTC was flat/negative will outperform by 15%+ over next 10 days as liquidity returns.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Post-stress periods see rapid capital redeployment. Alts showing resilience during stress become leadership candidates. Early momentum often begets more momentum as traders chase winners.
entry_conditions: Regime shifts from STRESS to NEUTRAL/BULL
Aggregate altcoin volume increases >25% day-over-day for 2 consecutive days

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price drops below pre-breakout consolidation low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Leadership fails to materialize - early strength alts underperform BTC in recovery phase
